t: IG Design Group Americas - Crunchbase Company Profile & Funding
s: ... Design Group Americas provides a variety of consumer products, including seasonal items, stationery, gifts, crafts, and toys, under their own brand and private labels. They distribute their products online and in stores across North and South America, Europe, and even Australia.

t: IG Design Group Archives - PIWORLD
s: IG Design Group plc, formerly International Greetings plc, is engaged in the design, manufacture and distribution of gift packaging and greetings; stationery and creative play products, and design-led giftware. The Company’s geographic segments include UK and Asia; Europe; USA, and Australia.
